general zone displayed with correct values (Precio: 1, Capacidad: 2000)

bug_fix_verification.bug_description: When editing a mixto event with multiple general admission zones, only the first zone was displayed
bug_fix_verification.fix_applied: ConfiguradorAsientos.jsx useEffect now uses JSON.stringify(configuracionInicial) for deep comparison and loads all categorias_generales
bug_fix_verification.verification_result: PASS - Both 'Gradas' (200 capacity) and 'general' (2000 capacity) zones are now displayed correctly
bug_fix_verification.expected_capacity: 2500 lugares (300 sillas from 30 mesas + 2200 entradas generales)

critical_code_review_comments: Fixed ESLint error: Removed invalid eslint-disable-next-line comment for react-hooks/exhaustive-deps rule that was not configured in the project
updated_files: /app/frontend/src/components/ConfiguradorAsientos.jsx - Removed invalid ESLint disable comment on line 64

context_for_next_testing_agent: Bug fix for multiple general zones in mixto events has been verified. The FESTIVAL DEL HUMOR event correctly displays both 'Gradas' (200 capacity, $2.5) and 'general' (2000 capacity, $1) zones when editing. Total capacity calculation is correct at 2500 lugares.
